Name: Nyoropon
Notes: A tube worm-like enemy that opens its eyes and tries to block the player's movement when approached. When the player touches it, they'll be damaged. It can be defeated with a Koopa Shell or by the light shone by the shell itself. Furthermore, the player can use Spin Attacks or Star Bits to defeat it. This causes it to drop three Star Bits.

Obj_arg7.Name: Eyes Open During Intro?
Obj_arg7.Description: If set, its eyes will be opened during a mission's intro sequence.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted, frozen and defeated by player 2.

SearchTurtle.Description: Red Koopa Shells and Gold Shells home in on this object.
